id: Health and Wellness Survey: A Notion Template
name: Health and Wellness Survey: A Notion Template
description: Looking to take control of your overall health and well-being? The Notion health and wellness survey is the perfect tool to help you get started. Divided into three sections - mind, body, and spirit - the survey asks participants to rate their agreement with statements or frequency of activities on a scale from 0 to 5.With customizable questions and easy-to-use templates, the survey is a flexible and effective way to assess your overall health and wellness.
